product_name: The North Face Rolling Thunder Medium Wheeled Duffel - 27"
long_description: Making other bags on the luggage carousel drool with envy, The North Face Rolling Thunder's 27 in. multipurpose design allows you to pack generously for weeklong excursions. Rugged inline skate wheels with reinforced housings promote easy wheeling. Large main compartment with internal compression straps and top zip mesh pocket keeps contents organized. Ambidextrous retractable handle is easy to maneuver. Protective skid rails guard against bangs and bumps. Easy-access zip top pocket carries on-the-go items and see-through pocket holds a business card. The North Face Rolling Thunder features multiple carrying options: bottom-, top- and side-carry handles.
short_description: Making other bags on the luggage carousel drool with envy, The North Face Rolling Thunder's 27 in. multipurpose design allows you to pack generously for weeklong excursions.
